name: KingPig
description: Greetings, esteemed King! Are you ready to embark on a grand adventure through the enchanted halls of the castle? A dark force has descended upon the kingdom, and it falls upon you to vanquish the wicked KingPigs and restore peace to the land. As you venture forth, beware of the hidden traps and treacherous foes that lurk around every corner. But fear not, for you are the brave and valiant King, and with your wit and bravery, you shall emerge victorious. So sharpen your sword and don your crown, for the fate of the kingdom rests upon your shoulders. The journey ahead will be perilous, but with a little luck and a lot of determination, you just might save the day and emerge as the ultimate KingPig slayer!
